column3: 2015| of bonita wellwood. bonita june wellwood
column6: 2015 at the age of 77 years. she was predeceased by her husband harold. bonnie is survived by her five children kelly
column15: tatum and bronwyn. in keeping with bonnies wishes
column16: there will be no funeral service. in lieu of flowers
column18: may make donations in her memory to regina wascana grace hospice
column22: s4r 8p6. thanks for your precious love and memories bonnie
